      • runEngine

        protected void runEngine(IEngineSetup setup,
                         IEngineContext engineContext)
                  throws EngineException
        The default implementation only calls BaseEngineLauncher.buildUpEngine(IEngineSetup, IEngineContext).

        Because of the way Android works, BaseEngineLauncher.loop(com.tokelon.toktales.core.engine.IEngineContext, com.tokelon.toktales.core.engine.IEngineLooper), as well as BaseEngineLauncher.startupEngine(com.tokelon.toktales.core.engine.IEngineContext) and BaseEngineLauncher.shutdownEngine(com.tokelon.toktales.core.engine.IEngineContext) will not be called.
        Instead the main loop and the driver calls will be handled inside activities (integrations).

        Overrides:
        runEngine in class BaseEngineLauncher
        Parameters:
        engineContext -
        Throws:
        EngineException - If an error occurs during execution.
